dynamic_facts.About Magicbricks: As the largest platform connecting property buyers and sellers, Magicbricks boasts over 2 crore monthly visitors and 15 lakh active property listings. With over 17 years of experience, Magicbricks has evolved into a comprehensive service provider, offering home loans, interiors and expert advice.Magicbricks also offers extensive research-based knowledge and insight-driven platforms like MBTV, India's leading online real estate YouTube channel, along with proprietary tools providing home buyers with price trends, forecasts and locality reviews.
